Standard priority purchase request for church lists needs review and submission by November 30th with minimal time investment required.

Next steps:
- Review existing notes and clarify what '10 10 40' refers to in the purchase request
- Gather specific details about the lists needed (type, quantity, vendor)
- Complete and submit the purchase request form through proper church channels
- Confirm submission and track approval status

Efficiency tips:
- Contact church office to clarify the '10 10 40' notation before proceeding
- Use any existing purchase request templates to speed up form completion
- Submit early in the week to allow time for any required revisions

Available actions: research, follow-up.
